alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Harney County through 415 PM PDT... At 322 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riddle Mountain, or 42 miles southeast of Burns, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Craters, Riddle Mountain, Diamond and Barton Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
